channel.title: What is Emberwind?
channel.description:
Has anyone played it? Do you like it? Why or why not? It looks pretty neat to me. Good production values and I love that it's Canadian. You can play with a GM or not. What little reviews I've seen have been positive.
https://www.emberwindgame.com/

item.title: What is Emberwind?
item.dc:creator: @David_Walker
item.description:
@David_Walker wrote:

It’s a GMless play to find out fantasy game. On the hard mechanics D&D end if things. It’s interesting and a beautiful setting and maynwork for groups looking for a more traditional gaming experience with an intestinf flip.

Read full topic
